EmailTemplate.name: Actor Membership Termination
EmailTemplate.subject: GADM Membership soon to expire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear *userName*,
*actorName* participation in GADM program will expire in *noOfdays* days. Subscription period will end *effectiveTo*.
To extend your subscription, please contact GADM Admin (*email*).
GADM Team gadm@iata.org
